content.raw:
Specifically, the SetParam and GetParam functions in 
[ODEPhysics.cc](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64/39/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_physics_ode/ODEPhysics_cc.html)
and
[BulletPhysics.cc](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64/39/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_physics_bullet/BulletPhysics_cc.html)
could use more test coverage, if there are any volunteers.
content.html: Specifically, the SetParam and GetParam functions in ODEPhysics.cc and BulletPhysics.cc could use more test coverage, if there are any volunteers.

pull_request.title: clean up ode code.  pass through some parameters used in vrc.

update.description:
* Allow setting various ODE PGS options via parameters.
 * Add various ODE PGS parameters pass through to gzclient GUI.
 * Update `GetParam` and `SetParam` for `ODEPhysics` and `SimbodyPhysics` for various parameters.
 * Update and add various ODE error metrics (bilateral, normal, frictional, etc)
 * Add energy (kinetic and potential) calculation in absolute world frame for Links and Models.
 * Update `Joint::ComputeInertiaRatio` to compute ratio across user specified axis.
 * Add `test/integration/pgs_test.cpp` to test various new PGS options used for VRC.
 * Remove `world/stacks.world` - it has no inertia info.  added `test/worlds/sphere_stack.world` with inertia info.
 * Split `physics.proto` into physics engine specific parameter messages.

[Jenkins coverage build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64/39/) Mar 20, 2014 11:48:08 AM

 * Remove `world/stacks.world` - it has no inertia info.  added `test/worlds/sphere_stack.world` with inertia info.
 * Split `physics.proto` into physics engine specific parameter messages.
